title: [BUG]  Publishing ASP.NET MVC app copies native libraries to wrong folder
body:
**Description**
Publishing ASP.NET MVC app copies native libraries to wrong folder.
Previous version 1.63 worked properly.
**Code**
Just Publish ASP.NET MVC app

**Expected Behavior**

native dlls are copied to bin folder

**Actual Behavior**

native dlls are copied to bin and root folder:

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.1
- Last known good version:  1.63.3
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2019
- Platform Target Frameworks: .NET 4.7.2


**Screenshots**

![obraz](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6661461/87679376-63a74480-c77c-11ea-97f5-d6e37a70bb8e.png)
